name: Moleskine Classic Notebook
description: The Moleskine Classic Notebook is a timeless notebook designed for daily journaling and note-taking. It features a durable hardcover with rounded corners, an elastic closure, and an expandable inner pocket. The notebook contains 240 ruled pages of high-quality, acid-free paper that ensures a smooth writing experience. The Moleskine Classic Notebook is ideal for writers, students, and professionals who value a high-quality notebook that can be carried everywhere. Its minimalist design and functional features make it a must-have for anyone looking to capture their thoughts, sketches, or ideas.

name: Leuchtturm1917 Medium A5 Dotted Notebook
description: The Leuchtturm1917 Medium A5 Dotted Notebook is a premium notebook perfect for bullet journaling, sketching, and planning. It features a durable hardcover with an elastic closure, two ribbon page markers, and an expandable pocket in the back cover. The notebook contains 251 numbered pages of high-quality, acid-free paper with a dotted grid layout. The Leuchtturm1917 notebook also includes an index and detachable pages for quick notes. Its thoughtful design and attention to detail make it a favorite among creatives, professionals, and students.
